Has Cosmos found his place in the multi-verse?! Why is Thulu holding secret meetings with agents of Voltrax 4?! Can Wyan reconcile her feelings for Cosmos and her duty to her king?! Annnndâ€¦ just what would happen if Cosmos tried to absorb a supernova?! Find out in the penultimate issue of THE BIGGER BANG!

Note: The digital edition (1/14/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.

Murmuration

Mike continues his quest for answers, while attempting a social life. Soon he finds that keeping his secrets is harder than he had hoped. Featuring pin-up art by ME & Butch McLogic!
name: Murmuration

description: Managua is on the verge of civil war. Arrested by order of President Sanchez, Buck and his friends have managed to convince the pilots of the Managuean Air Force that their nationâ€™s leader is in the pockets of drug cartels. With the assistance of the unit theyâ€™d come to train, Buck escaped to request assistance from US authorities. Meanwhile, Sonny and Tumb will have to help their rebel allies fight back loyalist forces â€“ and Lady Xâ€™s mercenariesâ€¦
name: Thunder Over the Cordillera

description:
Souvenir

A stand alone story set before the events at Arlam Station. Souvenir follows club owner Francis, his indoctrination into the Blood Forces by Jim Nevens, and the love triangle surrounding one of Francis' employees Gina.

You know that feeling in your gut that things just ain't gonna end well? Welcome to City War.
name: Souvenir

description:
The worldâ€™s greatest Popeye artist, Bud Sagendorf, tells a rousing tale of comicdomâ€™s nastiest villainess, the dreaded Sea Hag, in â€œDesert Pirates!â€ This potboiler jumpstarts when Wimpy meets one of her minions that craftily lures him with a bottle of, yes... hamburger aroma!

ENTER THE DRAGON

Following the events of the debut issue of THE DEVIL YOU KNOW, Greydon Cross finds himself in Hell on the hunt for Satan. Having fought his way through a horde of demons, Greydon must now battle his most DANGEROUS adversary yet. The MYSTERIOUS Emily Rain reflects on the events that placed her in Hell, and the DEADLY Queen, Ardat-Lile, learns of Greydon's existence. Donâ€™t miss this exciting new ongoing series from Aces & Eights Press!
name: Enter the Dragon

description:
Tyranny of Dragons! Can Minsc, Boo, and their new friends stop the dragon cult before their magical ritual destroys the city? Less talk, more fight! D&D is back as writer Jim Zub (Samurai Jack, Wayward) and artist Max Dunbar (Red Sonja) â€œDMâ€ a brand-new sword & sorcery extravaganza.

name: Part 4

volume.name: Dungeons & Dragons Legends of Baldur's Gate

description: Serialized from the pages of Dungeon Quest Book Three by Joe Daly, we join Millenium Boy, Millenium Boy, Steve, Nerd Girl and Lash Penis mid-adventure. At the Moon Shrine, Steve finally comes to and describes his righteous nude dreams, tinged with the effects of their "Orangutan Daydream."

When a mysterious space-time phenomenon causes 600 years of human history to collapse into a single era, societies from the past, present and future are forced to coexist in a dystopian civilization. To set the timeline straight, an elite team of Resynchronization Officers must rid the world of Anachronisms - futuristic artifacts that threaten the very laws of time. To ensure our future, we must undo it.

As the fragile world hangs together by tenuous threads, we meet the beautiful Ramona - a political activist with a curious connection to our hero. Meanwhile, officer Johannes and his partners track down the traces of black market medicine man "Dr. Tomorrow," leading them one step closer to the elusive outlaw "The Salesman." Venturing into an abandoned underground hospital, they make a chilling discovery - they're not alone! Will Johannes survive this brush with death long enough to reveal the master plans of Dr. Tomorrow?

Note: The digital edition (1/14/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.

ROUND 4! Amarosa has made it through three trials that have all tested her in ways she couldn't imagine. Though her fourth trail is colossal in more ways than one, finding out what makes her special may be the key to her success. The question is... will she figure it out in time?

Note: The digital edition (1/14/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.

Out of the Frying Pan

With a brand new B-17 Flying Fortress named "The Rookie" our boys are joined in the skies by Lawrence Bell's squadron of P-38 lightnings.

"Operation Checkmate" is underway deep in the heart of Nazi Germany to bomb Hitler in his Eagle's Nest compound.

The skies are eerily quiet, until the secret bombing mission runs into an airborne enemy unlike anything they have ever seen.
name: Out of the Frying Pan

description: The final showdown between Ace and Dark Bird has gone into overtime! Ace and Penny are flying an ancient, mystic being in the form of a jet fighter, just like Dark Bird's. But even with help from the Diggers Sisters and Dark Bird's archaeologist/ex-queen sister Trixie, she's still got Ace outmaneuvered, outgunned, and out of luck!

The Terrible Fruit Bats!, Part Two

VAMPIRES EVERYWHERE! The "Terrible Fruit Bats" rages on, as Solomon and friends uncover weird science and supernatural terror. A new breed of super-vampire has been spawned in a small Texas town and they have world domination in their sights. Can Halloween Man send these winged fiends back to the grave? Find out in part two of The Terrible Fruit Bats!"
name: The Terrible Fruit Bats Part Two

description:
The unpredictable second arc of INDESTRUCTIBLE comes to a shocking conclusion. A cranky sociopath, Tarr, has subdued the world's greatest superheroesâ€¦ and a super-fake. But for once, Greg's complete lack of powers may work in his favor. Will Stoner, in fact, save the day? Will Greg be forced to reveal the depth of his deception in the process? Will Barry ever put on pants?

Note: The digital edition (1/14/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
Is someone else besides Luthor turning his technology into something more lethal than he intended? And when the Monitor attempts to disarm the Earth Engine, the results prove deadly.
name: Chapter Thirty-Two

volume.name: Infinite Crisis: Fight For the Multiverse

description:
Larry B. Max is an unusual specialist from a little-known branch of the I.R.S. (Internal Revenue Service), the all-powerful tax-collecting agency of the United States, with every technological method at his disposal to link high finance and high crime.

Is the world barrelling towards the apocalypse? Russian commandoes are positioned around Georgia and its vital pipelines, fanatical terrorists are bent on eliminating Saudi Arabiaâ€™s reigning family... With oil barons indifferent to the potential damage their stock market manipulations could cause, only one man stands against a scheme of utter cynicism: Larry B. Max. This time, the IRS agent intends to stop his sworn enemy Madsen for good â€“ and rescue the woman heâ€™s loved for so long, Kate.
name: The Black Gold War

description: Jack awakens to flames of wrath as night marauders arrive to drive Rose's family off their land. Will Jack finally embrace his pulp fiction legend as a Wild West gunslinger? Read the final chapter and discover the true destiny of Jack Zero the Crackerjack Shot!

Kathy, Fuchs and Merlin are now exploring the savannah, looking for the Remington expedition. With them is Tom, the young native guide â€“ and sole apparent survivor â€“ of the American writerâ€™s party, who recounts the terrifying events that led him to run away. When Kathy and her companions finally discover Remingtonâ€™s base camp, though, they find no trace of unusual animals â€“ or bodies. But theyâ€™re quickly confronted to a series of increasingly weird eventsâ€¦
name: Encounters

description: Its ten years later, and the world as we know it is gone forever. Spencer Cradle has been in a coma for years, under the watch and care of Julia Dyer. But all is not lost as Cradle will finally resurface as the special agent he was meant to be, just in time to face down his archenemy John Knowledge one final time!
name: A New Language Part Six

description:
Trick or Illusion

After The Nanocamp re-unite with their fellow members they are now forced to make a decision that will shape their role in the universe. A chilling conclusion is revealed when they must return to Earth.
name: Trick or Illusion

volume.name: THE NANOC.A.M.P. (Cosmic Adventure of Maximum Potential)

description:
The epic super-soap saga continues!

Brace yourself for the epic 10-part 'Vicious Circle' storyline.

Anathama has been gathering her forces and now it's all-out war between her Vicious Circle and The O Men.

Traitors will be revealed, people will die, shocking secrets will be discovered - and by the end of the story arc, The O Men will have changed forever.

This book collects issues 18 to 27 of The O Men series.
name: Book Three

volume.name: The O Men: The Complete Story

description:
Werewolves, robots, and dead men, oh my! Merle Copeâ€™s plans to destroy the Allan family have been stopped cold, but now what to do with the body? Geoff and Vivian find out how messy the family business truly is, while Robot Face learns the terrible secret about his origin!

Valentina is reunited with MOTHER and together, along with Lyana and the rock-beast Ignatius, attempt a daring rescue of Yuri from within the dark heart of Castle Terror. Will they arrive in time? Or will the Queen steal his soul forever? Find out in the epic conclusion: Apocalypse Neva!

Note: The digital edition (1/14/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
name: Apocalypse Neva

description: Volume 2 of the hit web comic now coming to print! Vesper Gray is wrested from her stiff Victorian setting when a mysterious spirit saves her life. What secrets does her new friend hold, and how does it tie into her father's mysterious expeditions.

Tabula Rasa

Coltrane Walace has tracked down the assassin Allumette, but his plan for revenge is derailed when it turns out he's not the only one who wants her dead! Plus: the merc Carlos "Uzi" Uzziah is offered a job by a mysterious man with ties to Trane's former partner.
name: Tabula Rasa

description:
SEX AND VIOLENCE volume 2 is a full color, soft cover 64 page graphic novel about crime, lust, and redemption split into three distinctively different stories sharing similar themes written by Jimmy Palmiotti and Justin Gray and drawn by Romina Moranelli, Rafa Garres , Vanesa R. Del Rey and Paul Mounts. Excessive nudity and violence makes this an ADULTS ONLY title.

THE THREE STORIES:

The first short story is written by Jimmy Palmiotti and illustrated by Romina Moranelli called â€ DADDY ISSUESâ€ Itâ€™s about a seductive mother and daughter that have a connection and a goal they share, at any price. Giving any more away will ruin the story for you.

The second story is RED DOG ARMY written by Justin Gray and illustrated by Rafa Garres and it is epic. After conquering Poland in only 16 days, Hitler launched a full-scale invasion of Russia called Operation Barabossa. Stalin was desperate to halt the flood of panzer tanks headed toward Moscow. As a result he authorized a special unit to train and use dogs as anti-tank weapons. Red Dog Army is the story of aging dog trainer Yuri Schlonsky who was recruited into the army against his will and sniper Valeriya Petroff as they both try to not only survive the war, but also their deranged commanding officer who is doing everything he can to make certain they fail.

The third story is called FILTER and it is written by Jimmy Palmiotti and illustrated by Vanesa R. Del Rey, and is about a killer named Nico Gallo taking a look back on his life as a young man growing up in the tough streets of Brooklyn , New York, and the violent and murderous choices he made along the way that changed his life forever. Nothing in this story is as it seems.

Story Titles

  • Daddy Issues
  • Red Dog Army
  • Filter
name: Volume Two

description:
Puprposful Awakenings

Here is the end of the first act of SONS OF FATE. The conclusion that will affect out heroes not only individually, but are the beginnings of a bigger and far greater ripple that starts the tide of acknowledgement, change, and then REVOLUTION. For those involved destiny comes FULL CIRCLE. For some life's answers are reveled, while other's start their path for their own answers. Check out the conclusion to all that is ORIGINS, and beginning of much, MUCH MORE!
name: Puprposful Awakenings

description:
THE ONYX PROTOCOL! As PROWL confronts SPIKE over the humanâ€™s betrayal, the mystery of G.B. Blackrock and the Onyx Interface deepens. Meanwhile, Tokyo becomes a battleground as Arcee faces the Constructiconsâ€¦ and Galvatron!

The Weight of the Matter Part 2

Gravitas has been revealed, but what does he have in store for Capital City? Can our heroes withstand the mighty weight of his mere presence?
name: The Weight of the Matter Part 2

description: When you have one skill... use it, even if that talent is singularly out of place in the modern world. Valentine makes a daring bet to get the money he needs for his plan, but doesn't take into account everyone else might not be playing fair.

In this issue of Velda: Girl Detective we learn how a burlesque queen became a private eye in the 1950's when Velda tries to solve a "Murder at the Follies!" Also in this issue: Velda uncovers a Communist plot to blow up Margate, New Jersey in "Velda vs the Red Menace," and tackles a mysterious killer in "The Early Bird." As an extra bonus, a complete Velda short story is included! An adventure of Neolithica: Girl of the Pleistocene and Hawkshaw Hawk: Bird Detective round out this extra large issue.

Double Sized Triple Trouble

The mini-series finale!

Reptilian flair and vegan persistence made this real - Saturday Night Mean Event shall welcome the reptail vs. the cat. Will the toxic fumes of Ari-Zona harm the warriors? How many more will fall the victim of this war?

Noone can feel safe.

Bullgod awaits for the winner of this fight. The grand finale, the VrecklessMania, shall take place in surroundings unimaginable to anyone in all dimensions. What other attractions the cruel Manager will surprise us with?

The climactic conclusion to the first Wild Blue Yonder mini-series is here! War in the skies comes to the crew of the Dawn when the Judge pulls out an all-out attack. Both sides are out of options and not everyone will be flying home in this conclusion to the critical hit series!

description:
Snowblind! Scully is sightless and must rely on Wynn to survive in a world that seeks to kill them at every turn. Their stolen vehicle is carjacked in turn by even more dangerous lowlifes. And their oldest enemy, Skitters, has stalked them across two frozen oceans and two icy continents and is now within striking distance. It's a cruel world populated by crueler people where each day, each moment, might be your last.

Nigel is the last of the Genies, and the Faeriehoodâ€™s final hope. To get his powers back, heâ€™ll have to reconcile his two halves â€“ the Human who wants nothing but a carefree life, and the genie, all fire and violence. A balance must be reached, fragile and dangerous, before he can so much as recover the memories of his past lives. But Bound and the MI-10 havenâ€™t abandoned the hunt, and have managed to place an agent inside the sanctuaryâ€¦
name: Glee

description: When Yaya uses her invisibility powers to trail Bettina, she finds out that a sinister plot is underway. Can Yaya use her powers to stop this crime before it's too late?

â€œWHAT A RUSH!â€ In a battleground where no WWE Superstar trusts another, it helps to have a partner. Enter the ROAD WARRIORS HAWK and ANIMALâ€“ one of the greatest tag-teams in the history of the WWEâ€“ and theyâ€™re ready to inflict their vicious brand of violence on the WWE Superstars of the present and WWE Legends of the past. In the middle of the tag-team turmoil, Roddy Piper and Daniel Bryan attempt to discover the mystery behind it all but first they must get through the NWO reunion of Hulk Hogan and Kevin Nash!
name: Legends, Part Three: What A Rush!

description: The second volume of this three-volume series takes a satirical look at angsty Gen-X movies, Wall Street scam artists, alien abduction, the modern workplace, and Death. Pop culture references abound!
name: Vol. 2

description: The truth is revealed, leaving Zaya to embrace the only path available, one where she can hopefully set things right...

When you're the street walking dead, you never know what kind of situations you may find yourself in from town to town. This time Zombie Tramp may regret her choice of locals as she's drawn into an underground fight club. Grab your spurs, it's time for a honky-tonk beat down!
